posts.postText: I had an 8800 that died, and although I haven't personally tried it yet, I know the cure.  If you have a dead 8800 that lasted a few years, and then suddenly started having problems and soon died, then you are one of trillions of people!  You can BAKE your video card!  Look it up on Youtube, I will try it soon, and I should have my very expensive piece of hardware up and running again! (Although I already replaced it with a 9800, the 8800 is still fairly new and should sell easily.)
8800 Ultra? One of the best cards when they were launched and they still kick ass. Wish I had one :O
